Title: Push To Meow
Description:
scream at your friends with this awesome new mod :3

hold M long enough to do a long meow, or tap M quickly to do a short meow

this mod allows you to meow by the simple press of a button, featuring::::::::colon
- different meowing sounds for rivulet, gourmand, artificer, and spearmaster (also inv too)
- rebindable meow button thru control settings (works with controllers)
- custom iterator messages to you meowing
- meowing alerts other creatures (you can turn it off in settings!)
- rotund world support
- basic slugpup meow ai
- now also supports custom meow sounds!

what are you doing still reading the description??? Go Subscribe Now Subscribe Subscribe SubscribeSubscribeSubscribeSubscribeSubscribeSubscribeSubscribeSubscri

credtis;
- meow sounds, thumbnail and trailer video by cioss
- mod entirely programmed by me
- slugpup meow ai & translation programming by vultumast
- translators credited on the github page :)

anyway heres the source code for those who wanna check it out:
https://github.com/Andrew-Eathan/push-to-meow

also, if you're a custom slugcat mod developer who wants to add a custom meow sound for your slugcat (or replace existing sounds), here's a guide :)
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3261066431
Authors: mod idea & programmer: andreweathan // meow sound design, thumbnail & trailer: cioss // slugpup ai & translation programming: vultumast
